attributes.action: change the legal sex age to 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Personally I believe that 16 years old is too young to have sex. Many teenagers become pregnant to early in their lives and their live as a young person is not the same with a child. Teenagers are more likely to get a sexually transmitted disease than an adult. By raising the age to 18 teenagers might have the two years of their life which they wouldn't have had before.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/legalagesex/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
